name: Lucerne Master Class w/Hanspeter Kriesi
content: The Lucerne Master Class 2023 will be joined by Prof. Dr. Hanspeter Kriesi. The topic of the Seminar is "Europe in Times of Crisis". It will be held form the 17th to the 20th October 2023 in person in Lucerne, Switzerland and is open to all current PhD students. Please use the Application Form on the GSL Lucerne Website to register until the 7th of May.
